unnormalised: Hey Insta fam! Ever wondered if your reels are *actually* reaching beyond your immediate circle, or if that perfect Chai-time post at 4 PM on a Tuesday really resonated?
normalised: Hey I-n-s-t-a fam! Ever wondered if your reels are *actually* reaching beyond your immediate circle, or if that perfect Chai-time post at four P-M on a Tuesday really resonated?

unnormalised: Well, guess what? Follower analytics are your new best friend! Forget guessing, now you can see *exactly* who’s liking, sharing, and even snoozing on your content.
normalised: Well, guess what? Follower analytics are your new best friend! Forget guessing, now you can see *exactly* who’s liking, sharing, and even snoozing on your content.

unnormalised: Platforms like Insta and YouTube are beefing up their analytics dashboards, making it easier than ever for creators – from Delhi food bloggers to Mumbai fashionistas – to understand their audience. Think age demographics, location (hello, shoutout to our Coimbatore followers!), and peak engagement times.
normalised: Platforms like I-n-s-t-a and YouTube are beefing up their analytics dashboards, making it easier than ever for creators – from Delhi food bloggers to Mumbai fashionistas – to understand their audience. Think age demographics, location (hello, shoutout to our Coimbatore followers!), and peak engagement times.

unnormalised: So, if you're serious about your Insta game or building your brand like "Sharmaji Ka Beta" did with his educational videos, dive into those analytics! Check them daily; especially around major festivals like Diwali (24/10/2022) or during IPL season. They are your secret weapon. Remember that Viral Video you posted last year on 15/08/2023? See if that strategy will work again!
normalised: So, if you're serious about your I-n-s-t-a game or building your brand like "Sharmaji Ka Beta" did with his educational videos, dive into those analytics! Check them daily; especially around major festivals like Diwali (twenty fourth october two thousand and twenty two) or during I-P-L season. They are your secret weapon. Remember that Viral Video you posted last year on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three? See if that strategy will work again!

unnormalised: Pro tip: Experiment with different content formats at various times (like maybe 10:00 AM instead of 09:00 hrs), and track the results. You might be surprised! Happy creating, and may your follower count soar past the Qutub Minar!
normalised: Pro tip: Experiment with different content formats at various times (like maybe ten A-M instead of nine hours), and track the results. You might be surprised! Happy creating, and may your follower count soar past the Qutub Minar!
